Ballista springs are a component in making heavy or light ballistae. It is dropped by demonic gorillas in the Crash Site Cavern.

Ballista springs can be attached to an incomplete light or heavy ballista to create an unstrung light or heavy ballista, respectively. Attaching a light one requires level 47 in fletching, granting 15 experience in doing so. Attaching a heavy one requires level 72 in fletching, granting 30 experience in doing so.

[[File:Ballista spring detail.png|left|190px]]
'''Ballista springs''' are a component in making [[Heavy ballista|heavy]] or [[light ballista]]e. It is dropped by [[demonic gorilla]]s in the [[Crash Site Cavern]].

Ballista springs can be attached to an [[incomplete light ballista|incomplete light]] or [[incomplete heavy ballista|heavy ballista]] to create an [[unstrung light ballista|unstrung light]] or [[unstrung heavy ballista|heavy ballista]], respectively. Attaching a light one requires level 47 in [[fletching]], granting 15 experience in doing so. Attaching a heavy one requires level 72 in [[fletching]], granting 30 experience in doing so.
